Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
41 Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
50.
148Cittasampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
149Cittasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
